website_summaries.verdict: A rich, sweet-smelling body lotion that will leave your skin hydrated and smelling great.
pros: Thick, rich lotion that spreads easily
Moisturizes without leaving a film on your skin
cons: Some find the scent to be too strong

customer_reviews.title: I like the original formula better
customer_reviews.text: It was not the orignal formula or fragrances. this was my mothers favorite cologne so I wanted to remind myself of her by wearing it. Nope was not the smae. The seller made it right by refunding me. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: MizRose

customer_reviews.title: I love the smell of granny. I miss her
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent it reminds me of my granny that has past. But i did not receive the loston i cog the perfume so i will say this to seller thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: 🐾Susie Wade🐾

customer_reviews.title: The lotion is perfect for for a touch behind the ears and on ...
customer_reviews.text: The lotion is perfect for for a touch behind the ears and on the wrist because it can be overwhelming if you use it as a body lotion. This aroma smell is wonderful. I have had a lot of compliments as to what I am wearing and they wanted to buy it. I also told them HOW to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Cashion

customer_reviews.title: Soft and supply body lotion
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, especially after I shower, this is very light, and has a nice sent. Package arrived on time and in excellent condition. Priced just right.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and Reasonbe Cost
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered 3 days earlier than expected. I like this because of no fancy wrapping or box at all. I do not want to spend my money for those unnecessary parts.
customer_reviews.author: H-T

customer_reviews.title: Subtle and Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is the only place I can find this wonderful body lotion. Have used it for years and hopefully for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Twitch

customer_reviews.title: Not the same scent :-( - now made in China
customer_reviews.text: I used Passion by ET body lotion for years!! Loved the scent!! Just opened the first of 2 replacement tubes I purchased 12/2018. Despite the familiar label, the scent is quite different from the previously (for sooooo many years) Made in USA Passion by ET. In the photo, the Made in USA tube is the one without the cap. I transferred that flip-top cap to the new Made in China product, because it only had a screw on cap. Altogether, I'm beyond disappointed. If you liked the Made in USA version as much as I did, it's unlikely you'll like this product.
customer_reviews.author: deli rye

customer_reviews.title: I smell pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fragrance. I prefer the body lotion over cologne or perfume.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria A. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This product is a body lotion and it is a very pretty fragrance and makes my skin soft.
customer_reviews.author: maz02

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The scent was great as usual but the texture of the cream had become runny. Perhaps from age?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: *THIS IS MY FAVORITE BODY LOTION*
customer_reviews.text: *I HAVE USED THIS PRODUCT FOR YEARS, AND SOMETIMES IT IS HARD TO FIND. I AM GLAD YOU HAVE THIS PRODUCT! THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: kayti

customer_reviews.title: Not the same scent
customer_reviews.text: The scent is definitely not like it use to be....would I order again...no
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!! Thank you so much
customer_reviews.text: Great!! Thank you so much, it smelled so good. I ordered from eBay and they sent me a very old and stail product. I'll keep you on my list to order from.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite fragrance; I often am asked, what perfume are you wearing?
customer_reviews.author: Mary Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: You will love
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my sister and she has used it for many years and this is the only body stuff she will use
customer_reviews.author: palmage hall

customer_reviews.title: Have to try this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Got one in a gift box with the perfume last Christmas. Hard to find this sold separately, as I use the lotion more than the perfume. I bought four tubes to stock up. It is very reasonably priced. Also, I have very sensitive skin and it doesn't bother me when I apply it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Debora Jones

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smell anything like the perfume
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't smell anything like the perfume! I can't even use it as it just smells rancid when I put it on.
customer_reviews.author: R. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous compliment to Passion perfume. Keeps my skin soft, smooth, and smelling great! Absolutely love this product! Perfect finish to my morning routine!
customer_reviews.author: pepsiholic

customer_reviews.title: My Passion for "Passion"
customer_reviews.text: I love this fragrance and so does everyone else when I wear it. One comment was "Oh want a sexy smell" Really is great.
customer_reviews.author: Samianne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as sweet as white diamonds. It last about 6 hr in our Texas heat. Has a woodsy smell.
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect layer under the matching scent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use under the matching eau de toilette. The texture is smooth, silky and leave my skin lightly moisturized and scented.
customer_reviews.author: Little Red

customer_reviews.title: This is my signature scengt
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I use the lotion, cologne & powder.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lotion for your lover
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves this lotion and I love the way it makes her smell.
customer_reviews.author: AlaskaMan

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This was sent fast and was the best price .made a great birthday gift for my mom. It isu moms favorite
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Chirdon

customer_reviews.title: Passion Cream Review
customer_reviews.text: Great fragrance. Soft, not overpowering. Get compliments all the time. And my man loves it.
customer_reviews.author: typ206

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what it is, but the scent ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what it is, but the scent does not last. I don't know if it doesn't sell much and therefore its old. I've bought it at different stores, but I can't seem to find the one that lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Ana M. Telles

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years. I always get compliments when I wear it. I also have the fragrance and body wash.
customer_reviews.author: kikosno

customer_reviews.title: I really love it. It is not too perfummy and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love it. It is not too perfummy and I get lots of compliments on the smell. I have given some away to friends and girl grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Yelenosky

customer_reviews.title: P.U.
customer_reviews.text: This perfume has been on my to get list for a while. I clearly remember being at Sunglass Hut and the girl working there smelled great so I asked her what she was wearing and she told me Passion by ET. Sweet. Okay so I order this stuff and it is AWFUL. Maybe it just doesnt work well with my body chemistry. It was so strong and overwhelming and I couldn't get the granny smell off of me even after showering. NOT for me but maybe for you. TEST at the store before you purchase. UGH
customer_reviews.author: MamaToToo

customer_reviews.title: ... felt it was old and no longer had a good smell. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I felt it was old and no longer had a good smell. Very disappointed. Stale
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Passion products are my preference of the Elizabeth Taylor products.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Brozzo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for grandmothers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lotion for my mom and she loves it! It was inexpensive and it arrived pretty fast. The smell suits older aged ladies bring them memories. Elizabeth taylor passion is perfect gift for elder woman.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Good price, great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this size for a while. Good price, great product
customer_reviews.author: LaDonna Rice

customer_reviews.title: The box had been open
customer_reviews.text: The same as before. This product has been open I can't use this product because of that , again why open it.
customer_reviews.author: lucy

customer_reviews.title: Love The Passion
customer_reviews.text: This product has always agreed with my body chemistry and never bothers my allergies. I get a lot of complements on this product.
customer_reviews.author: sharon chaves

customer_reviews.title: My future husband loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My future husband says it is his favorite. Therrefore, I ordered it. It brings out the "best" in him. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: Excellelnt
customer_reviews.text: Worked well and it was good to have an Elizabeth Taylor historical lotion available through Amazon-thanks so much for it
customer_reviews.author: Hattie Byland

customer_reviews.title: Not for Me
customer_reviews.text: Very strong smell. I just can't use it. You get a very large size for the money. Others may find it okay. Reminds me of older women who love strong perfume.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Lotion that works !
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my arms, feet. and legs. As a diabetic it is a must have. I’ve been using PASSION for many years. It’s a good product and it smells good too! I’ve had problems with my feet and this works wonderfully !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a fainter fragrance...like almost not there....this is a bit heavy for my liking... Good price...quick delivery...
customer_reviews.author: gangi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: Always get complements when I where Passion. So does my mother. Men really seem to notice.....
customer_reviews.author: You Asked

customer_reviews.title: My favorite scent.
customer_reviews.text: I use the body lotion because it is a soft fragrance. I have used this fragrance since it first came out.
customer_reviews.author: Annette P.

customer_reviews.title: makes the fragrance last longer
customer_reviews.text: like the scent and goes wonderfully with the dusting powder and the perfume
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best smelling lotion!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely my favorite lotion, so many compliments from wearing this lotion,
customer_reviews.author: Gschun

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is very thick and have enjoyed using it. Would order it again.
customer_reviews.author: mafh9afh

customer_reviews.title: My favorite body lotion
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this body lotion for many years. I like the fragrance and the way my skin feels.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: I love Passion. I used to wear the perfume but my spouse thought the fragrance was too heavy. The solution was switching to the lotion.
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the cost of body lotion
customer_reviews.text: This is my fragrance!!! Very happy with the cost of body lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Alabama

customer_reviews.title: To much Passion
customer_reviews.text: I'd never tried Elizabeth Taylor's products, so I thought I would try a lotion first. This lotion is kind of loud for my taste. I'm sure if the lotion smells this loud, the perfume is worse. I have to wear just a little of it so it doesn't over power me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gholston

customer_reviews.title: Everything perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect transaction! Great price and great produt!! This lotion is a little old-school but it smells so Yummy.. I get comliments all the time!
customer_reviews.author: jessykat007

customer_reviews.title: it suits me the best.
customer_reviews.text: Always use this...and always plan to...it suits me the best.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K.

customer_reviews.title: Passion Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I found this and ordered from seller.Received quick and in great condition.I love The Passion Fragrance by Elizabeth Taylor.Have used for a long time.Recommend this for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: jeanette  johnson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE PASSION BODY LOTION
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE WORN ELIZABETH TAYLORS PASSION BODY LOTION AND PARFUME SPRAY SINCE SHE LAUNCHED IT WAY BACK WHEN. THIS WAS HER HER FIRST PRODUCT IN HER PERFUME LINE...WHENEVER I WEAR IT PEOPLE COMPLIMENT ME ON IT. I WAS GLAD TO FIND IT ON AMAZON AT SUCH A LOW PRICE...WILL ORDER AGAIN FROM AMAZON!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: for the price this is well worth it,i come from australia and perfume and creams like this are expensive but i would buy again
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: we were glad to find it
customer_reviews.text: one of our favorites, it has been discontinued . we were glad to find it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great fragrance and cream for moisturizing.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great body lotion after showering, to help moisturizer your skin. I layer this with the body powder and perfume for an all day subtle fragrance. I can't smell it after I first put it on as I've become somewhat used to it, but others say it's very light during the day and really pleasant. I use it as my signature fragrance and have had many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fragrance for 1960 women!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Passion by Elizabeth Taylor products for years and it is getting hard to find. The price is reasonable, ships quickly and saves me time searching other places.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: This body lotion is as it says very good smell and it last. This is what I always look for.
customer_reviews.author: brezze48

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: I got this lotion for myself not really into perfume last i like it get lots of positive feedback from it i normally wear Victoria Secrets
customer_reviews.author: n.t s

customer_reviews.title: Passion by Elizabeth Taylor
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years because it blends so well with my own sence. I add a little baby lotion to it and the mixture is heaven for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greatest product ever !
customer_reviews.text: I use lotion instead of perfume. It can go on my neck and arms, etc., and the scent lingers ALL day. Love the silky feel and great aroma. I get compliments all the time, "You smell wonderful"!
customer_reviews.author: D.Hart, RCIS

customer_reviews.title: Thank You!
customer_reviews.text: I am glad you sell this product!I don't like strong aromas, but the body lotion is milder. Thank You for selling it by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria R. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item before and forgot to check the seller so unfortunately the scent its not the same as before. This is very strong and completely different as the one I ordered before.Thanks to amazon I checked my former seller because they kept our old orders, and I ordered again from the right one. Hopefully I'll get it next week and will be the same scent I am looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria R. Lopez
